P0 I am conducting the study on behalf of BNP Paribas Bank Polska BNP Paribas Bank Polska has asked us to carry out a satisfaction survey of their partners to help them better meet their needs
S1 Firstly, could you please tell me your role at the company?
S1bis Could I please speak to a dealership manager or a salesperson?
S2 Are you involved in vehicle loan, leasing or long-term rental financing?
K1 To what extent would you recommend BNP Paribas Bank Polska to a colleague or a business contact?
K1bis Why did you give this rating?
A1How would you score your partnership with BNP Paribas Bank Polska in general?
O1 How much effort did you make to ensure that your last request was proceed by BNP Paribas Bank Polska?
B1a In your opinion, in terms of how quickly BNP Paribas Bank Polska makes financing decisions, what would be the ideal response time from BNP Paribas Bank Polska?
B2 How satisfied are you with how often you receive reporting documents from BNP Paribas Bank Polska?
B2a In your opinion, what would be the most suitable sending frequency?
B3 How satisfied are you with how often you receive reporting documents from BNP Paribas Bank Polska?
B4 Would it interest you to receive it?
C1 How satisfied are you in general with the quality of the contact you have had with analysts?
C5 What, in your opinion, should be the average waiting period for a decision regarding a loan / leasing / rental application (consent or refusal)?
D2 What would be the most appropriate contact frequency with the Salon Manager for you?

EB2 You said that you were not totally satisfied with how often the products trainings conducted by BNP Paribas Bank Polska takes place How often would you prefer the products trainings conducted by BNP Paribas Bank Polska to take place?
EB4 You said that you were not totally satisfied with how often the sales technics trainings given by BNP Paribas Bank Polska takes place How often would you prefer  such trainings should take place?

H1 Now let’s talk about the communications, documentation and advertising tprovided by BNP Paribas Bank Polska Generally, are you satisfied with the information and advertising materials provided by BNP Paribas Bank Polska ?

I1 Using a scale from 1 to 10, where 1 means that you have a very poor impression , and 10 means that you have a very good impression  (with the scores in between serving to express your opinion more precisely), how would you rate your overall impression
J1 Would you be willing to continue working with BNP Paribas Bank Polska in the future?
L1 Do you regularly work with a financial partner other than BNP Paribas Bank Polska?
L2 Apart from BNP Paribas Bank Polska, which credit organisations do you work with?
L3 Apart from BNP Paribas Bank Polska, which organisation do you work with most often?
L4 What are the two main reasons you work with another financial partner other than BNP Paribas Bank Polska?
